title: Sum to Product for Sum of Sines
text: The sum to product formula for the sum of two sines is as follows: $$sin\left(a\right)+sin\left(b\right)=2sin\left(\frac{a+b}{2}\right) cos\left(\frac{a-b}{2}\right)$$.
